fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-simplify person
-Bash person with rock
-become smart (3 use)

fields.name: Special perk thingies:
fields.value:
-simplify person now must speak not smart
-If target speak unsimplify, deal unstop attack at them
-You must speak not smart unless use not first ability
-you can instead bash target with rock

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bash all smart peoples with big rock
